website_summaries.verdict: Like the Puma Clyde Court Disrupt, reviewers are pleasantly surprised with the overall performance of the Reebok Sublite Pro Rise. It is extremely light, incredibly breathable, and quite supportive.However, depending on your foot shape, these basketball shoes can either be very comfortable to wear or quite painful to play in. Because of this, many are saying that these are terrible for basketball but good for casual use. All in all, the Sublite Pro Rise is still a nice alternative to Nike and Adidas shoes, especially for its price.
pros: These Reebok shoes fit well, several remark
The Sublite Pro Rise lives up to its name according to nearly all owners
They claim that these shoes are incredibly light
enabling them to jump higher and run faster
These are good basketball shoes especially for its price, several buyers assert
Many reviewers are satisfied with this shoe’s performance
The shoes are surprisingly supportive, a few comment
Quite a few appreciate the Sublite Pro Rise’s style
These Reebok basketball shoes are quite comfortable according to some wearers
Similar to the 11th Jordan CP3, more than a handful of reviewers are saying that these shoes have good traction
According to one tester, the cushioning is responsive and provides great court feel
These Reebok shoes are very breathable, a small number of players note
cons: A few users are disappointed with the shoe’s quality
They claim that the light materials are not durable enough for competitive basketball
Some say that these basketball shoes run a half size small and are not wide-foot friendly
These Reebok basketball shoes cause terrible blisters, a good number of players warn
They further say that the shoes are painful and uncomfortable wear

customer_reviews.title: Okay to wear, NOT sure to play
customer_reviews.text: I just played a basketball once with wearing this pair. I found that they are really light and in a good style. I like them, but after some foot steps the pain in my little toe was developed and sustained a day or two. I saw similar reviews from others here too. I guess the shoes are made light in the expense of the comfortableness like made by leather textile. Maybe that's because they are not broke in, but I didn't have the same experience with previous Nike BB shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and super light
customer_reviews.text: These are the third pair of this particular shoe that we have purchased. They are incredibly light and very comfortable. The shoe itself is super light but offers lots of support and is comfortable after running, playing basketball, playing dodge ball by a very athletic 11 year old boy. These shoes have been, by far, the most durable basketball shoes I have purchased for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Uriburu

customer_reviews.title: Good value basketball shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is an excellent basketball shoe for a limited use. Light weight, breathes well, good support. However, the material that makes the shoe light weight also made it less than durable. Blew the side of the shoe out within three months of playing ball five days a week. That said, for the price I was very satisfied with this shoe. Would definitely buy it again. Runs 1/2 size small though, so calculate that in when ordering proper size.
customer_reviews.author: David Wallick

customer_reviews.title: Sublite Pro Rise
customer_reviews.text: I have only worn this shoe twice so far but it have been every thing that I expected so far. Its a great light BBall shoe, I am used to wearing Jordan's while playing so it weight difference is great. There does seem to be less support but I wasn't expecting a shoe that is this light to be as supportive as a heavier shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Josh W

customer_reviews.title: Not the best Reebok shoe
customer_reviews.text: I typically love all Reebok shoes. These were the first I've tried that didn't meet expectations. They fit small in the arch and significantly rub up my foot. Maybe it's just me, but I don't even like wearing them. I do like that they are very light, but it doesn't matter much when it hurts to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: imnotgonnatellu

customer_reviews.title: Light good looking basketball shoe but doesn't fit my foot too well.
customer_reviews.text: Reebok has traditionally been one of the few basketball shoes that has fit my short wide foot. I have purchased several different Reebok shoes over the years and all have fit well except this one. It seems too narrow around the arch which caused blisters when I played with them. No other Reebok basketball shoe has ever done that. I'll try to continue breaking them in and see if the blisters stop but if not then I'll just have to use them as a casual walking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Gym Rat

customer_reviews.title: YES! BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: First time buying sneakes from the internet. They did not dissapoint. This sneakers are extremely cool, i feel like a jump higher thanks to the great support it has, also that orange color is brigther than it looks on the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Gab

customer_reviews.title: Decent Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Mike Sullivan Thes shoes are super light and are pretty sturdy and will use them to wear casually and to cross train in the gym. Thanks again. Sincerely, Mike Sullivan
customer_reviews.author: Sully

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Nice look and are very light weight, but gave my feet blister on my pinky toe, even with double socks..... Not the best shoe when to play in when it gives you blisters on both feet after just using 3 times with using 2 pairs of socks....
customer_reviews.author: Josh in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Really really really good, it's comfortable and it looks great. I would buy another pair after I save a little...
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Super lite
customer_reviews.text: The lightest basketball shoe I have ever had. Good grip too. I don't know how durable they are yet having played in them only once.
customer_reviews.author: wakefoot

customer_reviews.title: not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband because he was looking for comfortable shoes. However, these are very thin and gave him blisters. They are light but thats it.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Marchant

customer_reviews.title: IThis is the second time I buy these
customer_reviews.text: I love that you are well and if classic gloss. I usually use size 11 but this model I am size 10.5. Very comfortable and durable good.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Araujo

customer_reviews.title: Love these Shoes, Great Fit and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great Look and Great feel. These shoes are comfortable, supportive, and a sturdy light weight shoe. Feels and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: LAR

customer_reviews.title: Very light Basketball shoe...
customer_reviews.text: I have been very impressed with this shoe. Light weight and comfortable. Shoe far exceeded my expectations based on price range. Great for those who need an affordable, comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: looks nice - it's not for people with wide feet - the material of the sneakers does not seem so sturdy - the glue on the side is already coming off...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight very comfortable and at that price , wow even reebok.com have them for about 80 or 90 buck I love it it very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: Package was damaged but Footlocker sent a gift card, thanks for caring. Great price and my son loves the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes kind of awkard to play basketball in but looks so nice you want wear them everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Charles Jenkins II

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: These are the LIGHTEST shoes that I have ever had. They feel good, and are very supportive. I would highly recommend these to everyone. The price was GREAT. I just ordered another pair of Reebok shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Tillman Jr

customer_reviews.title: Bah
customer_reviews.text: Sucky shoe, everything is plastic... And is too small no matter what size it is. I would not recommend buying it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: Improve send to PERU
customer_reviews.text: The product it's ok, but the deliver was terrible. Please for the next deliver included the tracking number. Only that.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Medina Salguer

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: are very satisfied with my order my son enjoy the sneakers a lot. The sneakers were very nice and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: hattie jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: HEllo everyone come and try this. i bought one for me which is best fit to my sized and also a good quality
customer_reviews.author: William.Tara,Jr

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable but good ankle support
customer_reviews.text: This shoe provides adequate ankle support, but is the most uncomfortable basketball shoe I have ever worn. I am definitely going back to Nike.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Skinny Width in Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is too tight for average width feet. Good looking shoe and lightweight though. If shoe wasn't so narrow i would rate 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: D

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Sublite Pro Rise Basketball Shoe
